pdhp216:1: bahū veśaraṇaṁ yānti parvvate ca vanāni ca ।
pdhp217:1: na etaṁ śaraṇaṁ khemmaṁ na etaṁ śaraṇam uttamaṁ ।
pdhp218:1: yo tu buddhañ ca dhammañ ca saghaṁ ca śaraṇaṁ gato ।
pdhp219:1: etaṁ ve śaraṇaṁ khemmaṁ etaṁ śaraṇam uttamaṁ ।
pdhp220:1: gavāṁ ce taramāṇānāṁ jihmaṁ gacchati puṅgavo ।
pdhp220:2: sabbā tā jihmaṁ gacchaṁti nette jihmagate sati ।।
pdhp221:1: evām eva manuṣyesu yo hoti śreṣṭhasaṁmato ।
pdhp221:2: sa ce adhaṁmaṁ carati prāg eva itarā prajā ।।
pdhp222:1: gavāṁ ce taramāṇānāṁ ujjuṁ gacchati puṅgavo ।
pdhp222:2: sabbā tā ujjuṁ gacchaṁti nette ujjugate sati ।।
pdhp223:1: evām eva manuṣyesu yo hoti śreṣṭhasaṁmato ।
pdhp223:2: sa ce va dhaṁmaṁ carati prāg eva itarā prajā ।।
pdhp224:1: dhaṁmaṁ care sucaritaṁ na naṁ duccaritaṁ care ।
pdhp224:2: dhammacārī sukhaṁ śeti assiṁ loke paramhi ca ।।
pdhp225:1: dhaṁmaṁ care sucaritaṁ na naṁ duccaritaṁ care ।
pdhp225:2: brahmacārī sukhaṁ śeti assiṁ loke paramhi ca ।।
pdhp226:2: dhammaṁ anussaraṁ bhikkhū dhammā na parihāyati ।।
pdhp227:1: dhammo have rakkhati dhammacārī dhammo sucinno sukhāya dahāti ।
pdhp227:2: esānuśaṁso dhamme sucinne na doggatiṁ gacchati dhammacārī ।।
pdhp228:1: dhammo have rakkhati brahmacārī dhammo sucinno sukhāya dahāti ।
pdhp228:2: esā ’nuśaṁso dhamme sucinne na doggatiṁ gacchati brahmacārī ।।
pdhp229:2: jinnakroṁcā va jhāyaṁti jhīnamacche va pallare ।।
pdhp231:1: ujjujjanti satīmanto na nikete ramaṁti te ।
pdhp231:2: haṁsā va pallaraṁ hettā okam okaṁ jahaṁti te ।।
pdhp232:1: haṁsā va ādiccapathe vehāyasaṁ yānti iddhiyā ।
pdhp233:1: kin nu hāśo kim ānando niccaṁ prajjalite sati ।
pdhp234:2: evaṁ rakkhatha āttānaṁ khaṇo vo mā upaccagū ।
pdhp235:1: na muṇḍabhāvā śamaṇo avrato alikaṁ bhaṇaṁ ।
pdhp236:1: yo tu śameti pāpāni aṇutthūlāni sabbaśo ।
pdhp236:2: śamaṇā eva pāpānāṁ śamaṇo ti pravuccati ।।
pdhp238:1: krodhaṁ jahe viprajaheya mānaṁ saṁyojanaṁ sabbam atikrameyā ।
pdhp238:2: taṁ nāmarūpamhi asajjamānaṁ akiṁcanaṁ nānupatanti dukkhā ।।
